overview: Shukno Lanka is the story of a Junior artist living in a tinsel town, played by Mithun Chakraborty, who is yet to taste success after a struggle of 30 years of acting career.  The film motivates thousands of junior artistes, when the character played by Mithun gets signed for an International project as the leading man
tagline: An Ordinary Man - A Not So Ordinary Story
title: Shukno Lanka
